content: परिपक्व {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Completely cooked. {@--2@} Completely baked or burnt. {@--3@} Quite ripe, mature, perfected (<ab>fig.</ab> also); प्रफुल्ललोभ्रः परिपक्वशालिः <ls>Rs. 4. 1</ls>; so परिपक्वबुद्धिः. {@--4@} Highly cultivated, very sharp or shrewd. {@--5@} Fully digested. {@--6@} Decaying, on the point of decay or death.
